name: happy-ryu-22 // A Timex Sinclair Ryu (The 'Happy Ryu' Series)
description:
Can you spot the difference between this Ryu and the Sinclair 2068 one?

Part of a series of 43 movies using vintage computers and game consoles. Complete info at: https://github.com/electrocomfort/art-units/tree/main/happy-ryu
